rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each 1x4 marked area represents a digital clock that displays a valid time from left-to-right in 24-hour (HH:MM) format.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each 1x4 marked area represents a digital clock that displays a valid time from left-to-right in 24-hour (HH:MM) format.
